comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I think we should remove the submodule too so that people don't try to use it and get confused. Otherwise LGTM.

comments.author: bb010g
comments.body:
Is the `psl-monad.git` history available anywhere? https://github.com/PowerShell/psl-monad is gone, so history for all that code before the move isn't at the obvious place.

title: Merge changes that removes psl-submodule to master
